text: Oteman Sampson (born April 25, 1975) is a former American football quarterback who played three seasons in the Canadian Football League with the Calgary Stampeders, Toronto Argonauts and Ottawa Renegades. He first enrolled at Albany State University before transferring to Florida A&M; University. He attended Miami Edison High School in Little Haiti, Miami, Florida. He was also a member of the San Francisco Demons of the XFL. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats *Fanbase profile Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Players of American football from Florida Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Canadian football quarterbacks Category:African-American players of American football Category:African-American players of Canadian football Category:Albany State Golden Rams football players Category:Florida A&M; Rattlers football players Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:San Francisco Demons players Category:Ottawa Renegades players Category:Sportspeople from Miami Category:Grey Cup champions
title: Oteman Sampson
